description: Enterprise techniques used by KOMPROGO, ATT&CK software S0156 v1.1
name: KOMPROGO (S0156)

techniques.comment: [KOMPROGO](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0156) is capable of creating a reverse shell.(Citation: FireEye APT32 May 2017)
[KOMPROGO](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0156) is capable of retrieving information about the infected system.(Citation: FireEye APT32 May 2017)
[KOMPROGO](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0156) is capable of running WMI queries.(Citation: FireEye APT32 May 2017)
